description: Taxon is a pioneering technology-based startup in Argentina, founded by a biotechnologist specializing in artificial intelligence. Located in Rosario, the heart of the country's biotechnology sector, Taxon focuses on enhancing soil productivity through innovative biodevices and AI-driven solutions. With a strong emphasis on sustainability, the company collaborates with agricultural producers to analyze soil samples and develop environmentally friendly practices, aiming to improve agricultural outcomes while adhering to international regulations.
name: Taxon
